pr_title: Allow bazel projects to set up JxBrowser

timeline.message: Allow bazel projects to set up JxBrowser

timeline.bodyText:
The fact that
FlutterModuleUtils.declaresFlutter(project) returns false for Bazel projects is probably a bug. We should fix that instead of working around it here. Audit all the other uses to make sure none will be problems for bazel.
timeline.author: jacob314

timeline.message: Add TODO for better bazel flutter check
